name: Falling Falling
description:
A little arcade game made as the exam of one my classes back in 2020...

The goal of the game is simple: Get your 'ball' in the goal. 

How to play?
Your 'ball' drops.
Use the mouse to draw lines to move it around.
Red hurts. Black bounces. 
You have three lives, use them carefully. 
Faster ball = higher points.

Improved and tweaked a few things while posting this...

Hint hint, there's no limit to the number of lines you can draw.
Enjoy~ 

Yours truly, 
Entropy
